LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider.label: Trench Raider
LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider.description: This trench raider scyther replaced the blade with a trench Club, a short and cruel weapon known as the 'Head Smasher' designed for silent and deadly operations.
LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider.tools.0.label: left Trench Club
LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider.tools.1.label: right Trench Club
LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.WW_TrenchRaider_Corpse.label: Trench Raider corpse
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel.label: Sentinel
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel.description: elite Mechanoid soldier wearing full body bulletproof armor, holding aircraft machine guns.
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.WW_Sentinel_Corpse.label: Sentinel corpse
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy.label: Heavy Sentinel
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy.description: Heavy elite Mechanoid soldier wearing full body bulletproof armor,holding a high-speed submachine gun.
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.WW_SentinelHeavy_Corpse.label: Heavy Sentinel corpse
LanguageData.WW_Sppers.label: Sppers
LanguageData.WW_Sppers.description: A light armed Mechanoid often assigned to dig trenches.
LanguageData.WW_Firebat.label: Firebat
LanguageData.WW_Firebat.description: A heavily armored Spitfire Mechanoid that can ignite an entire trench at once.
LanguageData.WW_Firebat.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WW_Firebat.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WW_Firebat.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.WW_Firebat_Corpse.label: Firebat corpse
LanguageData.WW_SaintChamond.label: SaintChamond
LanguageData.WW_SaintChamond.description: A heavy armored assault tank, although for some unknown reason it lacks tracks and has more than ten legs.
LanguageData.WW_SaintChamond.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.WW_SaintChamond_Corpse.label: SaintChamond corpse
LanguageData.WW_TrenchPhone.label: Trench Command Headquarters Phone
LanguageData.WW_TrenchPhone.description: You can call the enemy elite team to attack at once
LanguageData.WW_TrenchPhone_Blueprint.label: Trench Command Headquarters Phone (blueprint)
LanguageData.WW_TrenchPhone_Frame.label: Trench Command Headquarters Phone (building)
LanguageData.WW_TrenchPhone_Frame.description: You can call the enemy elite team to attack at once
